subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] DO YOU KNOW A FRANK RATKA IN THIS GROUP?
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Yes, Frank is a contributing member of this group. I posted a message
earlier that his account has been hacked and it is sending out spam.
Hopefully Frank finds it out soon.

Zack


On 6/17/12, Manto <apollonia_14@...> wrote:
> HELLO IM MANDO FROM GREECE PLEASE NEED HELP I HAD TWO MESSAGES FROM EVP ITC
> GROUP FROM SOMEONE FRANK RATKA AND HE IS TALKING ABOUT A WORKING AT HOME
> SITE  BUT THE WEIRD IS THAT THEY WERE FOR OTHER MAILS NOT MINE WHAT IS
> THAT?IF ANYONE KNOWS PLEASE LET ME KNOW IF ITS HACKING THANK YOU
>
